knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## You will need

* A Census API key

## Load libraries and establish settings
```{r}
# Turn off scientific notation
options(scipen=999)

# Load the tidyverse.
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
```

## Setup Census API Key

You'll need your Census API Key:

```{r echo=FALSE}
census_api_key("YOUR KEY HERE")
```
